ygData.subject: Re: Weapon selections..
ygData.msgSnippet: For normal, non-skill building situations, I would use the Ebon Razor in primary and Sainy s Claw in secondary.  The Yak won t proc until level 37 , and the
ygData.messageBody:
For normal, non-skill building situations, I would use the Ebon Razor
in primary and Sainy's Claw in secondary. The Yak won't proc until
level 37 <?>, and the dam/delay is better on the Razor. The
dam/delay on Sainy's Claw is lower than a Yak, but you just can't
beat that 10 AC, heh

Once you hit 37, you could switch the razor for a Yak, but I
personally wouldn't... I'm not all that fond of Yaks and their
taunt... er, I mean proc. :)

Darkfox Reven'tsol
Xegony


> Ebon Razor (Main hand only.)
> 2 Ykeshas
> Ugly Stick (Staff of Writhing) (Main hand only.)
> 2 Wraithbone Hammers (Well, I use these for skill increases while
Baking actually.)
> 2 Enameled Black Maces
> Sainy's Claw (My favorite weapon I have.)
> 2 Obsidion Shards
>
> What weapon combo would work best for me?
>
> I am currently lvl 33 (For Proc determination.)
>
> Thank you for your input in advance. =)
